metadata.subject: Reformation
metadata.title: Petri Carpenterii I.C. Epistola ad Franciscum Portum Cretensem, in qua docetur persecutiones Ecclesiarum Galliæ, non culpa eorum qui religionem profitebantur, sed eorum qui factionem & conspirationem (quæ Caussa appellabatur) foueba[n]t, accidisse.
metadata.creator: Carpenterius, Petrus,d. 1586?
Carpenterius, Petrus, d. 1586?
Carpentier, Pierre, active 17th century
Portus, Franciscus, 1511-1581
metadata.description: Author's obit date from Adams; but this may be the Carpentier, Pierre, 17th cent. of LC NAF
Foliation errors: leaves 4, 21, 22, 23, 24 mis-numbered 7, 12, 21, 14, 12; no. 25 omitted from foliation
No device or decoration on title page except for four fleurons arranged in a cross-shape
Bibl. nat. Cat. de l'histoire de France, v. 1, p. 282, no. 314
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Irregular pagination. Page number errors. Page number 4 is numbered incorrectly as 7. No page number 13 or 16. Numbers are out of order between 20 and 26.
